alert.note: Alert for Fountain; Vermillion; Warren (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 06 at 11:31PM EDT until May 07 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT FOR FOUNTAIN...CENTRAL WARREN AND NORTH CENTRAL VERMILLION COUNTIES... At 1131 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Covington, or 11 miles east of Danville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Veedersburg, Williamsport, Hillsboro, Attica, Mellott and Newtown. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 3 and 23. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
